availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah Parmer (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Halifax, Virginia, native. Married to Sarah Parmer. Father of Nancy Parmer, Martha J. Parmer, Harvey Parmer, and John W. Parmer. Farmer in Lee County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1864.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Lee County, District 31, p. 65; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 5; KYR-0001-007-0308.
